name: Artemis: Book One
description:
You are a gifted programmer who, with your lover and business partner, landed a deal of a lifetime with a prestigious tech giant. Only to have your dreams taken from you with the swipe of a pen. Then, after recovering from the emotional trauma, you feel ready to start your new life. Reuniting with an old childhood friend, she proposes an opportunity that leaves you both curious and hesitant.Artemis: Book One introduces you to the world in which the story takes place and a bevy of new friendships (or relationships) that will help you along your journey. And sets the stage for the bigger picture and future books. Artemis has humor, emotionally heavy moments, and everything in between. Artemis is a story-focused visual novel with many characters of varying personalities.Book One is an introductory installment with three Books in the works that will be released as DLC.
  • Features chapters 1 through 4
  • 15,308 story renders, rendered In 1080p
  • 170 Animations rendered In 1080p At 60fps
  • 34 bonus renders hidden throughout the story, with a gallery to view them.
  • A replay theater to revisit lewd scenes
